items.name: Goku
items.description: Goku, the cheerful Saiyan warrior, embodies determination and kindness, constantly seeking powerful foes to challenge himself while protecting Earth and his loved ones.

items.name: Vegeta
items.description: Vegeta, the proud Saiyan prince, strives for power and mastery, often clashing with Goku yet gradually developing a sense of camaraderie and respect for his rival.

items.name: Piccolo
items.description: Piccolo, a former enemy turned ally, combines intelligence and strength, mentoring Gohan while protecting Earth from various threats with his powerful techniques.

items.name: Gohan
items.description: Gohan, Goku's eldest son, possesses immense potential and intelligence, often torn between his desire for peace and the responsibilities of being a warrior.

items.name: Krillin
items.description: Krillin, Goku’s best friend, embodies bravery and loyalty, often participating in battles despite his weaker power level compared to Saiyans.

items.name: Bulma
items.description: Bulma, a brilliant inventor, supports the Z Fighters with her intelligence and resources, often providing essential gadgets and strategies to aid their battles.

items.name: Frieza
items.description: Frieza, the tyrannical emperor, seeks absolute power and control, ruthlessly eliminating opponents while posing a constant threat to Goku and his allies.

items.name: Cell
items.description: Cell, the bio-engineered android, strives for perfection, using his ability to absorb opponents, posing a significant threat to the Z Fighters during his saga.

items.name: Majin Buu
items.description: Majin Buu is an ancient, playful creature with regenerative abilities and devastating power, posing significant threats to the Z Fighters.

items.name: Goten
items.description: Goten, Goku's youngest son, possesses immense power at a young age, showcasing his playful nature while aspiring to become a formidable warrior like his father.

items.name: Yamcha
items.description: Yamcha, a former bandit and martial artist, provides support in battles, often showcasing his resilience and loyalty to his friends despite his comedic shortcomings.

items.name: Tien
items.description: Tien, a dedicated martial artist, showcases impressive skills and determination, often standing alongside his friends to protect Earth against formidable threats.

items.name: Chiaotzu
items.description: Chiaotzu, Tien's loyal friend, possesses unique psychic abilities, providing support during battles while showcasing his courage despite his smaller stature.

items.name: Chi-Chi
items.description: Goku's strict wife, Chi-Chi fiercely protects her family and prioritizes education for her sons, often conflicting with Goku's carefree nature.

items.name: Gotenks
items.description: Fusion of Goten and Trunks, Gotenks is a powerful fighter known for his playful demeanor and tendency to underestimate opponents.

items.name: Trunks
items.description: Vegeta and Bulma’s son, Trunks is a skilled fighter, brave, intelligent, and determined, often standing alongside his friend Goten.

items.name: Master Roshi
items.description: A legendary martial arts master and mentor, Master Roshi trains powerful warriors while showcasing his quirky personality and surprising combat skills.

items.name: Bardock
items.description: Goku's father, Bardock is a low-class warrior who defies Freeza, leaving a legacy of bravery and strength for his son to inherit.

items.name: Raditz
items.description: Goku’s brother, Raditz arrives on Earth to recruit Goku for the Saiyan army, setting off conflicts that reshape Goku’s destiny.

items.name: Nappa
items.description: Nappa, a high-ranking Saiyan warrior, accompanies Vegeta to Earth, showcasing his brutal combat style and menacing presence during battles.

items.name: Broly
items.description: Broly, the legendary Super Saiyan, possesses immense power and uncontrollable rage, making him a formidable adversary with a tragic backstory.

items.name: Majin Buu
items.description: Majin Buu is an ancient, playful creature with regenerative abilities and devastating power, posing significant threats to the Z Fighters.

items.name: Beerus
items.description: Beerus, the God of Destruction, maintains cosmic balance through destruction, wielding immense power that commands respect and fear across the multiverse.

items.name: Whis
items.description: Whis, an angelic attendant to Beerus, possesses unparalleled power and training skills, often displaying a relaxed demeanor while executing his duties.

items.name: Jiren
items.description: Jiren, a powerful member of the Pride Troopers, embodies relentless strength and stoicism, driven by a past that fuels his quest for power.

items.name: Zeno
items.description: Zeno, the Omni-King, rules all multiverses with the power to erase entire realities, embodying both childlike innocence and immense authority.
